items.title: File Integrity Monitoring (BETA)
items.description: Reflex now supports adding File Integrity Monitoring (FIM) rules to your organization. FIM rules allow you to monitor for changes to files on your endpoints. For more information, see [File Integrity Monitoring](https://docs.reflexsoar.com/en/latest/agents/roles/file-integrity-monitoring).  Note: This is a Beta feature and requires a special agent.

items.title: Asset Benchmarking (BETA)
items.description: Reflex now supports benchmarking your assets against compliance Benchmarks.  For more information, see [Asset Benchmarking](https://docs.reflexsoar.com/en/latest/agents/roles/asset-benchmarking).  Note: This is a Beta feature and requires a special agent.

items.title: Package Manager (BETA)
items.description: Reflex now supports a package management functionality that will allow the Reflex agent to install and update packages on your endpoints.  For more information, see [Package Manager](https://docs.reflexsoar.com/en/latest/agents/roles/package-manager).  Note: This is a Beta feature and requires a special agent.

items.title: Detections
items.description: - Data Source Monitoring rules now support Automatic Data Stream discovery.

items.title: SOC Report
items.description: - The Security Operations Center report would link to https://localhost instead of the correct URL.  It will now properly use the configured base URL of the platform.
